FuncDef:
The consistency-check whitelist module stp service-type command configures the M-LAG consistency check whitelist for the STP module.
The undo consistency-check whitelist module stp service-type command cancels the M-LAG consistency check whitelist configured for the STP module. The consistency-check whitelist module stp service-type command configures the M-LAG consistency check whitelist for the STP module. The undo consistency-check whitelist module stp service-type command cancels the M-LAG consistency check whitelist configured for the STP module. By default, the M-LAG consistency check whitelist is not configured for the STP module.
CLIs: consistency-check whitelist module stp service-type stp-m-lag-priority
undo consistency-check whitelist module stp service-type stp-m-lag-priority

ParaDef.Info:
STP priority of the M-LAG interface.
-

Examples: [*HUAWEI-dfs-group-1] consistency-check whitelist module stp service-type stp-m-lag-priority
